title: The Lady is a Stalker - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Cooking   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Nobles   Royalty   Transmigration   Tsundere   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 댕게
description: Our unlucky MC has transmigrated into the world of the novel she was reading the night before. In this new world, she is now Celebi de Pirineus, an obsessive stalker of the Crown Prince. If things continue as the way they are, she’ll be doomed to be executed. Celebi decides to improve their relationship… But nothing seems to be working? Oh well, let’s just give up. Strange, the Prince seems to be a little too bothered by this.>
